headline.main: Obama Spokesman Denies Trump Claim of Wiretap Order
headline.print_headline: Obama Spokesman Denies Trump Claim of Wiretap Order

lead_paragraph: A spokesman for ex-President Barack Obama on Saturday denied President Donald Trump's allegation that the former president ordered a wiretap of him last October.
snippet: A spokesman for ex-President Barack Obama on Saturday denied President Donald Trump's allegation that the former president ordered a wiretap of him last October....
